::DrillBit::

He was finally able to make it inside. Then KitKat's messages came over.
He went to check on the guests, but they had already entered. He found
KitKat. He had a big smile, as he came up and massaged her shoulders.
"Hello love."

::Hot Rod::

With the Mafia gone, he turned his fire on the base.
